entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a character who has been interacting with Hermione and is now reacting to her revelation that she is a girl.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who has been trying to convince Ron of her identity and is now storming off towards the girls' dormitories.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as a character who is quietly disagreeing with Ron's assertion that Hermione is lying.

relationships.description: Ron disagrees with Hermione about her identity, as evidenced by his statement 'She's lying'.
Ginny disagrees with Ron's assertion that Hermione is lying, as evidenced by her quiet response 'She's not'.
Hermione is supported by Ginny in her claim of being a girl, as evidenced by Ginny's agreement with Hermione.
Ron has an argument with Hermione about her identity, as evidenced by their conversation and Ron's reaction to her revelation.
